title: A Special time
creator_credit: Doug Johnson, Julie Johnson, Warren Johnson and Perennial Productions
brief_description: Full of practical suggestions on how to have fun with children, this film stresses that the sharing of appropriate ‘play’ activities can improve the quality of a family’s life through a very special bonding.
creator_credit_for_label: Doug Johnson, Julie Johnson, Warren Johnson and Perennial Productions
